Name: Frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' leading to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' that result in 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all submissions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to total rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' that are not dismissed compared to those that lead to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' performed by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' over 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Occasions how often the 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' is performed before 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: The ratio of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' that are not eventually performed compared to total submissions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Average number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
